job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of improving AI models through feedback and participation in fine-tuning sessions, a core aspect of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies is a direct task within model development and experimentation.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities with human expertise to enhance a service, fitting the definition of integrating AI into a system.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a rapid ramp-up period implies a need for quick learning and adaptability to new products and systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating an expectation for the candidate to unblock themselves.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on analyzing, improving, and integrating AI systems within a customer support context. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning and prototyping (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on applying human expertise to enhance AI performance and integrating AI capabilities into the support process (1.A.1). The role is about supporting and improving an existing AI system rather than developing novel AI models from scratch or focusing purely on AI research. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile, which involves building or maintaining software that uses AI as a core part of its functionality.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines tasks related to AI system improvement and integration, as well as the need for self-sufficiency and rapid learning. While it mentions 'AI model fine-tuning', the overall context points more towards application support and enhancement rather than deep AI model development. The profile assignment is reasonably confident, but a slightly higher score would be warranted with more explicit details on the 'AI system' being worked on.
